tutorial: How to Set up a New Chart

definition.text: One thing to keep in mind when adding Time Machines is that they will often spawn on top of other charts within the Charting Space.

paragraphs.text: Let's get a little practice organizing our charting space. Once you begin adding more and more time machines this will become increasingly important!
Arranging the charts by dragging them side by side.
Remember, to move a chart hold Shift and drag with a left-click.
